author: mgrigorov
msg: Check the package resource's path for '../' and replace it with the configured placeholder.
If there is no configured placeholder then the resource guard will refuse to accept it.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Disable neon version check for <= 1.5.

author: tomwhite
msg: WHIRR-146. Changing the mapred.child.java.opts value does not change the heap size from a default one. Contributed by Tibor Kiss.
